abstract.original_text: Any discussion of quantitative abnormalities of lymphocytes and immunoglobulins is necessarily linked because the B-cell compartment is responsible for immunoglobulin production, and the T-cell compartment helps provide the stimulus. Nevertheless, clinicians are often consulted when a quantitative disorder of one or the other is recognized. Thus, although overlapping, the defects are presented separately.

sentences.segment_text: Any discussion of quantitative abnormalities of lymphocytes and immunoglobulins is necessarily linked because the B-cell compartment is responsible for immunoglobulin production ,
and the T-cell compartment helps provide the stimulus .
Nevertheless , clinicians are often consulted when a quantitative disorder of one or the other is recognized .
Thus , although overlapping , the defects are presented separately .
